name: A Hell of an Exorcist
description:
A Hell of an Exorcist

-------------------

Play the role of a muscular priest exorcist in his 50's. You are an expert at your job and you want to get the things done quickly. You are on a hike across the country, walking from town to town, banishing demons from houses. A boring classic routine.

You have clearly mastered the job and are fed up with all these demon nonsense. You just want to finish the job as fast as possible to get the money and find a new client. Your body is quite muscular, you will probably have to be careful not to break everyone's furniture, or you could also not care. Up to you.

Keyboard Controls Move  —  WASD Camera — Mouse  Interact or use first weapon — Mouse Left Click Use secondary weapon — Mouse Right Click Space — Jump Tab - Show Objectives

I also made this one Speedrun friendly!    

(Small advice, visit the bar for a speedboost ;) )
